title: Number of Dollar Tree stores in Canada by province 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 5 number of Provinces.
The maximum Number of stores 110.0 is found at Province Ontario and the minimum is found at Manitoba where Province is 13.0.
The difference of Number of stores between the highest and lowest Province is 97.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 5 number of Provinces.
The Number of stores is highest at Province Ontario and lowest at Province Manitoba.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 5 number of Provinces.
The maximum Number of stores 110.0 is found at Province Ontario and the minimum is found at Manitoba where Province is 13.0.
The difference of Number of stores between the highest and lowest Province is 97.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 5 number of Provinces.
The maximum Number of stores 110.0 is found at Province Ontario and the minimum is found at Manitoba where Province is 13.0.
Province British Columbia has the second highest value for Number of stores.
The Number of stores of Province Manitoba is 8.46% smaller than the maximum value at Ontario.
Province Ontario is higher than any other Provinces with value 110.0, followed by British Columbia, and Alberta. Down to Province Manitoba with the lowest value 13.0.
Considered together, the average Number of stores in all 5 Provinces is roughly 45.0.
Summing up the values of all Provinces, we get total 225.0.
